LanguageData.ComAil.Name: Common Ailments
LanguageData.ComAil.NegHealthSound: Use "Negative Health" sound for notification messages:
LanguageData.ComAil.CAStartDays: Number of game days before ailments begin [Default 60]:
LanguageData.ComAil.CAFrequency: Frequency in game hours to check for ailments [Default 24]:
LanguageData.ComAil.CAChance: Base % chance to contract an ailment [Default 10]:
LanguageData.ComAil.CASTIChance: Base % chance to contract an STI [Default 10]:
LanguageData.ComAil.CASTIOffset: Offset to contract an STI (more negative = less chance): [Default -50]:
LanguageData.ComAil.CanAddScenario: Allow Common Ailments to be added to scenarios:
LanguageData.ComAil.ChangeValueTip: (Changes to this setting will be applied after restarting Rimworld)
LanguageData.ComAil.Confirmation: has contracted a common ailment of
LanguageData.ComAil.DoSymptoms: Salli vakavampien sairauksien käyttää yleisiä vaivoja oireina:
LanguageData.ComAil.Symptomatic: Common Ailments lisäsi mahdollisen oireidenkäytön {0} sairauksiin.
